alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and northern Taylor Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Woodville to 9 miles west of Perry. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Perry, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Iddo, Secotan, Boyd, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Plum Orchard, Scanlon, Econfina, Lake Bird, Fanlew, Wacissa Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Hampton Springs, Shady Grove and Newport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
